post.body: is avoiding the freeway this morning cuz of rain
hearing the first drops of rain. Gonna be wet the next few days. Hope it doesn't rain on Wed night for company holiday party
is researching automation tools for verifying JavaScript dialog boxes
installed VirtualBox on Kubuntu to run a virtualized WinXP
won a comp day from team poker but has a burnt headlamp
saw a guy thru his rear view mirror of a guy on a motorcycle wearing a skeleton mask in Studio City
is working on documentation
is excited that Flickr has an iPod Touch/iPhone friendly portal now
is at Yangtze on a team lunch at 3rd Street Promenade
almost filled up the tank with ~$25 @ $1.86. A very nice change when it was more than double a few months ago.
is at the L.A. Autoshow.
finally got reading a HTML source, parse for ID to store, and then select a random ID working
is heading to Old Town Pasadena for a MISSA get-together
is finally washing his car. It's been around 2 months..
loves the lowest gas prices in 3.5 years, but isn't digging all the vehicles on the road now.
played a refreshing 1 hour of tennis rallying before work this morning
is working on Selenium RC scripts
heard that one of his college classmates is pregnant with triplets. Wonder if it's true.
wants to organize files in WinXP but doesn't know of a built-in way to label or categorize files. There's keywords but want a visual way.
is at a baby shower. Had to suck juice out of a baby bottle, but lost.
done with dentist. Picking up new pair of glasses.
is at the dentist for checkup and cleaning.
is saying Yes to "Yes Man"
is having dinner at P.F. Changs on 3rd Street Promenade
wishes his commute is 45 minutes every workday. Been like this since Tuesday this week. Will change at the New Year.
is working on multiple projects. busy busy busy
WinXP SP3 does not work with VirtualBox. Restoring to previous checkpoint hoping it'll be ok
is the only one in his section of the building right now. Very quiet
talked to Lisa! She remembers me and is looking for my old Manager.
just saw Lisa Carter in the building. Nice seeing old faces
